bug.author: hktxt
bug.description:
Describe the bug This ios app has a problem of screen shot. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: the detection algorithm works perfectly. However, it can't capture images which camera sees. I press the camera icon button, it takes a screen shot, then I check it in photos, but nothing saved only bounding box.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16555750/59656440-261a6580-91d0-11e9-99a6-80031223c3ee.png></denchmark-link>
Smartphone (please complete the following information):
Device: [iPhoneXR] OS: [iOS12.3.1]

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/hktxt>@hktxt</denchmark-link> yes you are correct, this is a bug in the app! We are in the process of developing a fix, but for the time being screenshots can be captured also the traditional way, by pressing all 3 sidebuttons on the iPhone (two volume buttons + power button) <denchmark-link:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT200289>https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT200289</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26833433/59689882-b95b9700-91e0-11e9-93da-71f1db132b58.png></denchmark-link>
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
